summary:
Craft Thalmor Armour at any forge (under Leather).

Available in: Blue & Black (wearing any mix will still give the full set bonus)
*********************************************************************************
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#00ffff]Craft Thalmor Armour at any forge (under Leather). [/color]

(Male & Female)
Weight: L = Light H = Heavy
Thalmor Armour L (13) H (15)
Thalmor Gloves  L(5) H (8)
Thalmor Hood[color=#ffff00]*[/color]   L (10) H (13)
Thalmor Boots    L (10) H (13)
*********************************************************************************
[color=#cc0000][b]Requires[/b]:[/color] Advanced Armours, Arcane Blacksmith.
*********************************************************************************
[color=#cc0000][b]Available in[/b]:[/color] Blue & Black (wearing any mix will still give the full set bonus)
*********************************************************************************
[color=#cc0000][b]Codes[/b]:[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Depending on what mods are loaded, the numbers below may differ. It could be 05xxxxxx 06xxxxxx etc.[/color]

[color=#1e84cc][b]Blue[/b]:[/color]
Armor:  060048B5
Hood:   06004E1C
Gloves: 06005381
Boots:   06005382

[color=#000000][b]Black[/b]: [/color]
Armor:  060063B5
Boots:   06006925
Gloves: 06006926
Hood:   06006927

[b][color=#00ff00]If these don't work, open console and type 'help thalmor' Use pageup/down to scroll through.[/color][/b]
*********************************************************************************
[color=#cc0000][b]Known Bugs[/b]:[/color]

None known at the moment.
*********************************************************************************
[color=#00ffff]Note: Wearing this armour does not make you a member of the Thalmor (no disguise), It's just the armour![/color]

[b][color=#ffff00]*Circlet friendly[/color][/b][/size]
author: HyPNOS

files.name: Thalmor Armor Set
files.changelogHtml: Removed the need for Ingots for upgrading - just leather/strips are needed.
